attributes.action: SERIAL ARMED ROBBER ESCAPES FROM OPEN PRISON
attributes.additional_details: THE HOME SECRETARY SHOULD RESIGN IMMEDIATELY IN THE WAKE OF THE SERIAL ARMED ROBBER WITH MULTI- LIFE SENTENCES FOR ARMED ROBBERY CONVICTIONS BEING RELEASED DAILY FROM A KENT OPEN PRISON TO WORK IN THE COMMUNITY - ONLY TO COMMIT FRESH ARMED ROBBERIES WITHIN 2 OR 3 DAYS

rejection.details: Thank you for your e-petition.  The Home Secretary is no longer responsible for prisons; this is an issue for the Secretary of State for Justice.  You may wish to resubmit to the Ministry of Justice.
